response.job_title: LCA analyst at PRé Sustainability | Chemical engineer with a passion for sustainability
response.summary:
Multidisciplinary, enthusiastic, and disciplined chemical engineer with a MSc in Industrial Ecology seeking to create an impact on a real-world context by the creation, promotion, and management of diverse sustainable initiatives within the chemical industry. I have had experience with wastewater treatment, steam, and power generation within an industrial context. 

Passionate about sustainability, water management, and nutrient recovery. Great capacity to solve problems efficiently and to work in groups. Responsible and eager to learn every day.
response.skills: Life Cycle Assessment, Investigación, Biotecnología, Planificación estratégica, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Resolución creativa de problemas, Italiano, Inglés, Aspen Plus

profile_positions.description: Helping different companies understand their environmental impact through the development of LCA or related tools
profile_positions.title: Sustainability Analyst

profile_positions.description: Design a process to increase the circularity of phosphorus within wastewater treatment plants
profile_positions.title: Researcher

company.name: Wetsus, European Centre of Excellence for Sustainable Water Technology

profile_positions.company: Wetsus, European Centre of Excellence for Sustainable Water Technology
profile_positions.description:
1. Environmental and techno-economic assessment of phosphorus recovered from manure.
2. Experimental work involving biocrystallization of P from manure.
profile_positions.title: Project Intern

profile_positions.location: San Carlos de Guaroa, Meta, Colombia
profile_positions.description:
1. Optimize the use of different fuels for energy generation. 	
2. Ensure the continuous supply of water, steam, biogas and power to the production plant.
3. Control and supervision over the biogas plant and the associated wastewater streams for its correct functioning. 
4. Coordination of the 'utilities' team within the plant.
profile_positions.title: Production Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
1. Analysis and characterization of raw materials and finished products.
2. Implementation and control of a new wastewater treatment to enhance the environmental performance of the company. 
3. Reformulation of several products offered by the company with the main objective of removing non-biodegradable raw materials.
profile_positions.title: Laboratory Analyst

company.name: PRé Sustainability
company.description:
At PRé, we help companies turn sustainability strategy into action, through fact-based consulting services, training and software solutions based on life cycle thinking. Organizations reach out to us to measure, improve and communicate their sustainability performance. With our assistance, you will be able to develop effective strategies and integrate sustainability in your supply chain, product development or organization. 

Sustainability is a team effort. PRé and our flagship product SimaPro aim to play a pivotal role in creating a vibrant ecosystem that connects different worlds, systems, people and companies in support of a more sustainable future. Join us, our partners and customers in creating fact-based solutions that will help make this vision a reality.
